title: French grammar in context
content: This short article reviews noun gender, adjective agreement, and core sentence patterns so English speakers can connect rules with authentic examples.

title: Verb conjugation cheat sheet
content: A compact reference summarizing present, past, and future tenses for the most frequent French verbs along with mnemonic devices.

title: Deep learning primer
content: Deep learning relies on multilayer neural networks and has become central to computer vision, speech recognition, and multilingual retrieval pipelines.
